section.title:
Headers
Number signs (#) are used for headers. The primary header, H1, has one number sign. Subheaders have at least two number signs. The smaller the header, the more number signs it has.
Italic Text
section.p: Italic text is placed inbetween underscores. For exmaple: _This text would be italicized_.

section.title: Bold Text
section.p: Bold text in Prose.io is accomplished by having two asteriks on both sides of the text. For example: **This text is bold**.
